mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM v3_fixed_deposit_products AS fixed_deposit_products

SELECT fixed_deposit_products.id as id, fixed_deposit_products.created_dt as createdDt, fixed_deposit_products.last_modified_dt as lastModified_dt, fixed_deposit_products.sold_out as soldOut, fixed_deposit_products.selling_disabled as sellingDisabled, fixed_deposit_products.listable as listable, fixed_deposit_products.waiting_sell_start as waitingSell_start, fixed_deposit_products.selling as selling, fixed_deposit_products.sell_start_dt as sellStart_dt, fixed_deposit_products.sell_end_dt as sellEnd_dt, fixed_deposit_products.total_amount as totalAmount, fixed_deposit_products.project_id as projectId, fixed_deposit_products.intro as intro, fixed_deposit_products.max_orders_per_product as maxOrders_per_product, fixed_deposit_products.project_intro as projectIntro, fixed_deposit_products.last_product_subfix as lastProduct_subfix, fixed_deposit_products.yield_rate as yieldRate, fixed_deposit_products.icon as icon, fixed_deposit_products.name as name, fixed_deposit_products.product_name_tpl as productName_tpl, fixed_deposit_products.duration as duration, fixed_deposit_products.product_sn_tpl as productSn_tpl, fixed_deposit_products.min_order_amount as minOrder_amount, fixed_deposit_products.max_order_amount as maxOrder_amount, fixed_deposit_products.max_user_amount as maxUser_amount, fixed_deposit_products.min_step_amount as minStep_amount FROM v3_fixed_deposit_products AS fixed_deposit_products WHERE id = #{id}
